poemsDataJson.list_full: みかきもり 衛士(ゑじ)のたく火(ひ)の 夜(よる)は燃(も)え 昼(ひる)は消(き)えつつ ものをこそ思(おも)へ
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: Like the guard's fires//Kept at the imperial gateway --//Burning through the night,//Dull in ashes through the day --//Is the love aglow in me.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Mikaki-mori|Eji no taku hi no|Yoru wa moe|Hiru wa kie tsutsu|Mono o koso omoe
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: ひるはきえつつ ものをこそおもへ
poemsDataJson.author: 大中臣能宣朝臣(おおなかとみのよしのぶあそん)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 夜も昼も思い悩む恋心の苦しみ
